review: I have this product and I have used it many times for Netflix and Hulu. I personally like this product because it's easy to move from tv to tv. I prefer boxes like the Apple TV or the Roku but this is a great product for the price and a nice gift for someone that doesn't have a smart tv
author: Benjamin

review: Slows internet transmission speed when transferring movies from laptop to TV screen. Great for surfing the web, looking at Ebay, Amazon, Pictures, etc.,  but not for online movies.  On movies, there is "still frame" jitter.  Useless there. Disappointed.
author: d. Benyo

review: Easy to install and works fine but I still prefer my old Roku so I don't have to tie up my laptop.  I also have to watch the TV shows at reduced quality or the sound is not clear.
